name: JunkIsland
description:
In JunkIsland you have to protect an island from garbage

FULLSCREEN ONLY

- Video from the current build:

- Commands & Rules

1 - Use W A S D to move

2 - Press "e" near a garbage bag to take it

3 - Press "e" near a garbage can after that to destroy the garbage

4 - Use your mouse to drag n' drop garbage bags and push them away from the island

5 - If a garbage bag stays for more then 5 seconds on the terrain, it damages your island's health

6 - Every 6 garbage bags destroyed restores 1 health
